title: HAPPYWORK
descrption: HAPPYWORK is a downloader used by APT37 to target South Korean government and financial victims in November 2016. [1]

references.title: FireEye. (2018, February 20). APT37 (Reaper): The Overlooked North Korean Actor. Retrieved March 1, 2018.

related.Name: Remote File Copy
related.Use: can download and execute a second-stage payload.[1]

related.Name: System Information Discovery
related.Use: can collect system information, including computer name, system manufacturer, IsDebuggerPresent state, and execution path.[1]

related.Name: System Owner/User Discovery
related.Use: can collect the victim user name.[1]
